notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification was based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. This table excludes data for federally funded R&D centers.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Science Foundation, Business R&D and Innovation Survey (BRDIS), Business Research and Development Survey (BRDS) (annual series).Science and Engineering Indicators
